decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing various forms of card advantage, countermagic, and efficient tutors to assemble a winning combo. It includes a mix of disruptive spells, removal, and efficient card draw to control the game while searching for key combo pieces. The commander, Cormela, Glamour Thief, provides additional card advantage and synergy with the deck's strategy. The deck aims to quickly generate mana with spells like Dark Ritual and High Tide to power out its combo pieces, including Tendrils of Agony for a lethal finish. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting opponents' strategies, the deck aims to execute its combo and win the game before opponents can establish their own game plan.

The deck focuses on generating tokens with Prossh, Skyraider of Kher and sacrificing them for value. It includes various cards that can generate mana quickly, allowing for explosive plays and combo potential. The deck also includes a variety of disruption spells to control the opponent's board and hand, ensuring the combo can go off smoothly. With cards like Blood Artist and Purphoros, God of the Forge, the deck looks to drain or burn the opponent out once the combo is assembled. Overall, the deck aims to efficiently ramp, generate tokens, sacrifice them for value, and finish off the opponent with a lethal combo or overwhelming board presence.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's actions through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. By utilizing Ertai Resurrected as the commander, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while slowly building up its own resources. The deck includes a variety of counterspells like Counterspell, Force of Will, and Mystic Confluence to protect itself and stop key threats. Removal spells like Fatal Push and Toxic Deluge help deal with opposing creatures, while card draw spells such as Opt and Memory Deluge ensure a steady stream of resources. The deck also features cards like Hullbreacher and Opposition Agent to further disrupt the opponent's plans and gain incremental advantage.
